net.rim.device.api.ui
Interface FocusChangeListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
SpinBoxFieldManager
public interface FocusChangeListener

Listener interface for handling changes in focus within fields.

Fields that want to handle focus change events should implement this interface. Field classes identify the listener object to handle focus change events with their setFocusListener method.

Three kinds of focus events should be handled: FOCUS_GAINED, FOCUS_LOST, and FOCUS_CHANGED.

See Also:
Field.setFocusListener(FocusChangeListener)

Field Summary
static int FOCUS_CHANGED
          Field prompting the event signals a change in focus.
static int FOCUS_GAINED
          Field prompting the event has gained the focus.
static int FOCUS_LOST
          Field prompting the event has lost the focus.
 
Method Summary
